caption.p: Effect of TSA oil on renal oxidative stress markers ( A) MDA and ( B) GSH against Cd-induced renal injury in rats. *** p < 0.001, shows the comparison of toxic control with the untreated (normal control) group (unpaired t-test); ### p < 0.001, shows the comparison of the treated group with toxic control (one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey test). Each bar represents mean Â± SEM ( n = 6).
